auth.quote: Your moments, our memories - share your snapshots with the world.

auth.title: Authentication

message.successInfo: Your account has been created successfully. Please check your email to activate your account.

homePage.title: Home
homePage.description: Welcome to our site - the best place to share your moments with the world.

joinNow.intro: Join Us and Keep Your Group's Story Alive

skeletonOne.title: Capture and Cherish Every Moment Together
skeletonOne.description: Easily store and organize your group’s photos in one secure place.

skeletonTwo.title: Preserve Your Group’s Memories in One Place
skeletonTwo.description: Create a beautiful, shared album for all your unforgettable moments.

skeletonThree.title: The Ultimate Photo Hub for Your Crew
skeletonThree.description: Keep all your group’s photos safe, organized, and accessible anytime.

skeletonFour.title: Relive the Best Moments with Your Friends
skeletonFour.description: Share and enjoy your group’s favorite memories, all in one app.

commentSection.title: What people are saying
commentSection.description: See what our customers are saying about us

notFound.heading: Oops! The page you are looking for could not be found
notFound.info: The page you are looking for might have been removed, had its name changed, or is temporarily unavailable.

error.title: Error
error.heading: Oops! An error occurred
error.info: An error occurred while processing your request. Please try again later.

fullName.required: Full name can not be empty
fullName.min: Full name must be at least 3 characters
fullName.max: Full name must be maximum 50 characters

username.min: Username must be at least 3 characters

email.invalid: Email must be a valid email

phoneNumber.min: Phone number must be at least 10 characters

password.min: Password must be at least 8 characters
password.pattern: Password must contain at least one letter and one number
